name: Aplikasi Microblogging menggunakan Code Igniter , Google MAPS API dan Material Design
tagline: Computer and Communication Laboratory 2016 - Web Development
body:
### Selamat Pagi CNC Selamat Pagi CNC merupakan pelatihan gratis yang diadakan setiap tahun oleh Computer and Communication Laboratory.
Materi pelatihan ini mengenai web microblogging menggunakan fitur geolocation Google MAPS API, backend menggunakan CodeIgniter (Credit to http://www.codeigniter.com) serta frontend menggunakan framework CSS MaterializeCSS (Credit to http://www.materializecss.com) ### ScreenShot - Halaman Login ![Halaman Login](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/44349390/Image%20SPC%20CNC%20Github/Screen%20Shot%202016-04-08%20at%205.14.50%20PM.png) - Halaman Signup ![Halaman Signup](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/44349390/Image%20SPC%20CNC%20Github/Screen%20Shot%202016-04-08%20at%205.14.58%20PM.png) - Halaman Beranda ![Beranda](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/44349390/Image%20SPC%20CNC%20Github/Screen%20Shot%202016-04-08%20at%205.16.19%20PM.png) - Halaman Timeline ![Timeline](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/44349390/Image%20SPC%20CNC%20Github/Screen%20Shot%202016-04-08%20at%205.16.38%20PM.png) - Sidebar ![Sidebar](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/44349390/Image%20SPC%20CNC%20Github/Screen%20Shot%202016-04-08%20at%205.16.45%20PM.png) ### Petunjuk Instalasi - Download file mysql pada link di bawah ini: https://db.tt/XjSXCetW - Lakukan konfigruasi database pada config/database. Sesuaikan nama databasenya. - Lakukan import database pada phpmyadmin - Pastikan base_url sama dengan nama folder project Anda yang berada pada htdocs. Note: Jika membutuhkan modul tersedia pada link berikut: https://db.tt/XbZKPyol ### Ask and Support Apabila ada pertanyaan mengenai project ini silakan kontak ke alfirahadian@gmail.com Developed by: - Alfi Rahadian (Senior Member Web Development 2016) - Rifma Dwi Leony (Senior Member Web Development 2016) Thanks for visit. Good luck and enjoy!
Computer and Communication Laboratory
O Building Room 203
School of Electrical Engineering
Telkom University
